Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Talk to Captain Teake in the yard.<sp:5:1:0> Work
with her to decide how best to deploy
our forces.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Padda is in the courtyard. She's in charge
of the materials we have on hand.<sp:5:1:0> We
could reinforce our defenses with them...
If you need anything, you should talk
to her.
